OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients stratify accord age ( 1 month vs 1 month ) . Infants less 1 month age stratify accord Philadelphia score ( le 1 v least 1 ) . Infants 1 month age also stratify accord Philadelphia score ( le 2 v least 2 ) . Infants 1 month age Philadelphia score le 1 infant 1 month age Philadelphia score le 2 undergo observation . Infants 1 month age Philadelphia score least 1 infant 1 month age Philadelphia score least 2 receive VP-CARBO chemotherapy . - VP-CARBO chemotherapy : Patients receive etoposide IV 2 hour carboplatin IV 1 hour day 1-3 . Treatment repeat every 21 day 2 course . Patients response receive CADO chemotherapy . - CADO chemotherapy : Patients receive cyclophosphamide IV 1 hour day 1-5 , doxorubicin IV 6 hour day 4 5 , vincristine IV day 1 5 . Treatment repeat every 21 day maximum 4 course . Patients follow within 6 month annually 5 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 130 patient accrue study within 4 year .
